title: The Shooting gallery (TEFC)
creator_credit: Sim Productions, Kratky Film, Sim Productions (U S), Zdenek Bumba and Miroslav Stepanek
brief_description: Mechanical targets in a shooting gallery are the protagonists in this allegory about the repression about freedom and the destruction of love. The film is a springboard for thought and discussion about political, social and interpersonal relationships. Animation by Stana Prochazkova.
